name: Mist Mobility Potion
description:
Increases movement speed in the Fractals of the Mists. Stacks up to five times.
With Fractal Attunement Mastery, converts a portion of your agony resistance to concentration.
Turn in unwanted potions to Dessa's Alchemist for Fractal Relics.

details.name: Fractal Mobility
details.description: Movement Speed in fractals is increased by 5% per stack. Endurance recharge rate in fractals is increased by 10% per stack.

name: Endless Spotted Beetle Tonic
description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

name: Mini Professor Mew
description:
Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.
Combine 3 of this mini with a Pile of Crystalline Dust, an Obsidian Shard, and an Amber Quantic Dipole (dropped by creatures in scale 120 fractals) in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Mister Mittens.
